post.title: what's the difference between these two micro sd cards?
post.content: hey guys, these two cards are the same capacity at 16gb however, one is $59..and the other $119.. i want to get one for my 9700 but want to know if there is a difference between the two. thanks for your help. http://www.bestbuy.ca/catalog/prodde...30catid=21974 http://www.futureshop.ca/catalog/pro...0126113catid=
